title: Obsession
lyrics:
8 ContributorsObsession Lyrics
Did I hypnotise?
We could disappear into the night
But your obsession keeps my secrets well intact (Obsession keeps my secrets well intact)
Yeah, your aggression feels so heavenly
But let me say

I sonder them all (But you)
A portrait of a lady on fire in my head
I'll surrender and crawl
Even if it breaks me
Just say that you will never leave
Cause we're meant to be
Yeah, tonight

Your beauty feels like suffering
I'll take it all
Cause what we do in the dark has got me thinking

I'm with you
In my head
Your devotion makes your bullets feel so real
You won't pierce my shield
(Let's make a deal, no?)
You won't make me yield
No, not anymore
You might also like
So I keep you draped in a silver light
I know this double exposures got me composed in a petty fit
Yeah, contact, contact
Open up
You wanna know?
Vertigo, I'll stay obsessed

"...that you would pick up because I miss you, a lot. And, um... I'm sorry that I'm crying right now, but I'm drunk, and um...
I miss you, so much. And I know that this is bullshit, because you found a new perfect girl for you..."

I'll slaughter them all (But you)
A portrait of a lady on fire in my head
I'll surrender and crawl
Even if it breaks me
Just say that you will never leave
Cause you're heavenly, uhEmbed
